event.title: 1903 the mine of Bor was opened

data.event: In 1903 the mine of Bor was opened which was important moment for the development of Bor.

event.title: written in Hungarian during his forced labour (1944

data.event: The poet Miklós Radnóti wrote here some of the most beautiful poems ever written in Hungarian during his forced labour (1944) in the copper mines.
